verses.roman:
patha chāḍi' nārada tāra nikaṭe calila
nārade dekhi' mṛga saba palāñā gela

synonyms: patha chāḍi'—leaving aside the path; nārada—the saintly person Nārada; tāra nikaṭe—near him; calila—went; nārade dekhi'-seeing Nārada; mṛga—the animals; saba—all; palāñā gela—left, running away.
translation: "When Nārada Muni left the forest path and went to the hunter, all the animals immediately saw him and fled.
